organic_results.title: Introduction to Modern Information Retrieval by G.G. Chowdhury
organic_results.snippet: Introduction to Modern Information Retrieval. An information retrieval system is designed to analyse, process and store sources of information and retrieve those that match a particular user's requirements. A bewildering range of techniques is now available to the information professional attempting to achieve this goal.

news_results.title: OGC Membership approves the OGC API - Environmental Data Retrieval specification as official OGC Standard
news_results.snippet: The Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) is excited to announce that the OGC Membership has approved the OGC API - Environmental Data Retrieval (EDR) specification for adoption as an official OGC Standard.
